snippet: Those plans to teach history will be put on hold: Bud Selig is expected to accept an offer to remain as baseball commissioner.
abstract: MLB commissioner Bud Selig, who is 77, is expected to accept an offer from league owners to remain in the position for at least two more years.
lead_paragraph: Those plans to teach history will be put on hold: Bud Selig is expected to accept an offer to remain as baseball commissioner.

headline.seo: Bud Selig Likely to Remain as Baseball Commissioner
headline.main: Selig Is Likely to Stay in Office at Least 2 Years
headline.print_headline: Selig Is Likely To Stay in Office At Least 2 Years
